DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration Performed Study Activity Date and Time Range PCORnet CDM Prescription Order Start Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation._Start date of order. This attribute may not be consistent with the date on which the patient actually begin taking the medication.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration Performed Study Activity

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Prescription Order Start Date
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Start date of order. This attribute may not be consistent with the date on which the patient actually begin taking the medication.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model
